data.title: THE WORLD OF NULL-A, bound with UNIVERSE MAKER
data.meta_description: New York: Ace Books, Inc, 1953. Paul Orban and Stanley Meltzoff. First edition. first printing. Paperback. Very good plus. Item #54406 Ace Double, book number D-31, with 35¢ cover price. Cover art by Paul Orban and Stanley Meltzoff. Opening crease along the spine. A very good plus copy.

data.text:
New York: Ace Books, Inc, 1953. Paul Orban and Stanley Meltzoff. First edition. first printing. Paperback. Very good plus. Item #54406

Ace Double, book number D-31, with 35¢ cover price. Cover art by Paul Orban and Stanley Meltzoff. Opening crease along the spine. A very good plus copy.
